name: Octo Garden
description:
Help our clumsy octopus plant his garden! You plant seeds when dashing (spacebar), and by touching them with one of your arms, you make them grow until you finally harvest them. Different flowers have different effects when harvested, and they can trigger each other harvests as well!

The entire game is made with Unitys custom circle and square sprites.

Thank you for playing, and let me know what you think!
